entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Snow at times mixed with rain beginning near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with rain changing to rain near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Local rainfall amount 15 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the morning then southwest 40 gusting to 60. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow mixed with rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Snow at times mixed with rain in the evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
